title: Cobaltocenium-containing poly(carbazole)s towards alkaline-stable anion exchange membranes via post-polymerization modification
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, 8,4767-4771
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00888J, Communication
Jin Chen, Jing Yan, Weihong Yang, Yunxin Xu, Rui Chi, Qiuyu Zhang, Yi Yan
The combination of superacid-catalyzed polyhydroxyalkylation and CuAAC post-polymerization modification gives robust alkali-resistant cobaltocenium-containing poly(carbazole) AEMs.
